title: why does league hate bronze players
body: i just want to know why league think its ok to put people in something that they cant get out of like there no hope of gettting out unless you get a team that ok try to 1v5 hyper carry is not something someone going to know unless there a bad player but like saying your the lowest of the low because of it like doesnt seem right you should be grade on how you do not how your team does
